name: @tee/data
description: Package in charge of storing and building TEE datasets

scripts.build-json-output: npx ts-node src/generateProgramType.ts && npx ts-node src/buildProgramJsonOutput.ts
scripts.build-json-output-watch: nodemon --exec "npx ts-node src/generateProgramType.ts && npx ts-node src/buildProgramJsonOutput.ts" --ext yaml,json,ts --ignore src/generated --ignore public/data --ignore generated

author: Julien Paris & Pierre Camilleri
